meanings.definition: Lacking ears or having no visible ears.
meanings.sent1: The earless rabbit hopped around the field.
meanings.sent2: The statue of the earless cat was a unique art piece.
meanings.sent3: The earless teddy bear couldn't hear the children's laughter.
meanings.sent4: The earless vase stood out among the other pottery.
meanings.sent5: The earless mannequin displayed the latest fashion trends.

meanings.definition: Without ears or the ability to hear.
meanings.sent1: The earless robot moved silently through the room.
meanings.sent2: The earless doll was unable to respond to sound.
meanings.sent3: The earless toy car couldn't listen to music while driving.
meanings.sent4: The earless wall clock ticked away in silence.
meanings.sent5: The earless ghost floated noiselessly through the haunted house.
